ResourceHeader.Description: This investigation is designed to provide complete, accurate specification of solar wind flow parameters in real time. The instrument is a six-axis ion-electron spectrometer which provides three-dimensional velocity distribution functions for ions and electrons, with high time resolution. The energy range covered extends from 7 eV to 30 keV for electrons in four different modes, and from 30 eV to 30 keV in four different ion modes. In addition, two Faraday cups are used to obtain three-dimensional measurements of ions in 15-s periods, in the energy range 5 eV to 5 keV.
